author: wtopstaff
title: Jets-Bruins Sums
text:
0 1—2 
First Period_1, Boston, Krejci 1, 5:36. Penalties_Lowry, Wpg (tripping), 1:54; Burmistrov, Wpg (illegal check to head minor), 19:23; Lowry, Wpg (roughing), 19:23; Bergeron, Bos (roughing), 19:23. 
Second Period_2, Winnipeg, Scheifele 1 (Byfuglien), 5:26. 3, Winnipeg, Wheeler 1 (Ladd), 9:17. 4, Winnipeg, Stafford 1 (Lowry, Chiarot), 17:39. Penalties_None. 
Third Period_5, Boston, Pastrnak 1 (Beleskey, K.Miller), 1:25. 6, Winnipeg, Thorburn 1 (Stafford, Burmistrov), 5:17. 7, Winnipeg, Petan 1 (Copp, Stuart), 9:51. 8, Winnipeg, Burmistrov 1, 16:22 (en). Penalties_None. 
Shots on Goal_Winnipeg 6-11-15_32. Boston 14-10-7_31. 
Power-play opportunities_Winnipeg 0 of 0; Boston 0 of 2. 
Goalies_Winnipeg, Pavelec 1-0-0 (31 shots-29 saves). Boston, Rask 0-1-0 (31-26). 
A_17,565 (17,565). T_2:26. 
Referees_Greg Kimmerly, Francois St. Laurent. Linesmen_Brad Kovachik, Derek Nansen. Topics:
